mapper.insert: insert into post (contents, reg_date, category_id, title) values (#{contents}, now(), #{categoryId}, #{title})
mapper.select: select id, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, category_id as categoryId from post where category_id = #{categoryId} order by reg_date desc
select id from post where category_id = #{categoryId} order by reg_date desc limit 1
